name: Music Disc 11 (Extended Cut)
description:
This is an extended version of a short, fan-made Minecraft horror game based on Music Disc 11 I made.

Thanks to everybody who played the original Music Disc 11 fan game and to those who gave your feedback. Something a lot of people said is they would love the game to be longer, so I decided to do just that. Enjoy the Music Disc 11: Extended Cut.

If you've played Minecraft before, you would most likely know what Music Disc 11 is. If not, here's the audio for it:

Be sure to leave a rating to let me know what you think of the game!

ALSO:

Here's the original version here:

I'm working on a much larger horror game at the moment called Bodhi 'n' Friends - so if you're into a more longer and more story-driven experience, go check out the demo for Bodhi 'n' Friends:

Minecraft is a registered trademark owned by Microsoft Corporation, this is not an official Minecraft game.
